X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The total number of requests in a given time window.

user_id.description: The hashed ID of the user that created this product.

assigned_user_id.description: The hashed ID of the user assigned to this product.

project_id.description: The hashed ID of the project that this product is associated with.

vendor_id.description: The hashed ID of the vendor that this product is associated with.

notes.example: These are some notes about the product.

cost.description: The cost of the product. (Your purchase price for this product)

price.description: The price of the product that you are charging.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product. (used as a default)

archived_at.description: The timestamp when the product was archived.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the product was created.

is_deleted.description: Boolean flag determining if the product has been deleted

in_stock_quantity.description: The quantity of the product that is currently in stock

stock_notification.description: Indicates whether stock notifications are enabled for this product

stock_notification_threshold.description: The minimum quantity threshold for which stock notifications will be triggered

max_quantity.description: The maximum quantity that can be ordered for this product

product_image.description: The URL of the product image

tax_id.description:
The tax category id for this product.'

The following constants are available (default = '1')

```
PRODUCT_TYPE_PHYSICAL = '1'
PRODUCT_TYPE_SERVICE = '2'
PRODUCT_TYPE_DIGITAL = '3'
PRODUCT_TYPE_SHIPPING = '4'
PRODUCT_TYPE_EXEMPT = '5'
PRODUCT_TYPE_REDUCED_TAX = '6'
PRODUCT_TYPE_OVERRIDE_TAX = '7'
PRODUCT_TYPE_ZERO_RATED = '8'
PRODUCT_TYPE_REVERSE_TAX = '9'
```

message.description: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
message.example: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
